name: Color Switch (itch)
description:
Color Switch is an addictive reflex game.

Tap to keep a ball bouncing in the air and match its color to an obstacle in order to pass through it. Pass through as many obstacles as you can before crashing into a different color than your ball. The ball will switch colors when passing through the Color Switcher.

The challenge of the game is that the obstacles are moving and the ball is changing color. Over time, the obstacles become more complex utilizing different speeds, shapes and areas of color.

The only rule is don't fall through the wrong color. Jump into the wrong Color and you'll have to start over. Very Addictive Color Switch game!
